text:
Morning, I’m trying to follow the guide here <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-js-building-block-examples/blob/main/hello-world/README.md> but when trying to clone the folder I get “Please make sure you have the correct access rights
and the repository exists”.

Are you using `
```git clone git@github.com:HubSpot/cms-js-building-blocks-hello-world.git```
to clone the folder?
<@UDHT6N5SM> Yes, I’m simply following the guide.
yea, that's odd. I just tried and was able to clone it

Just tried again and I get the full message

Cloning into ‘cms-js-building-blocks-hello-world’...
<mailto:git@github.com|git@github.com>: Permission denied (publickey).
fatal: Could not read from remote repository.

Please make sure you have the correct access rights
and the repository exists.
Hm, I wonder if the ssh key you have connected to github is messed up
Oh, whoops. I linked you to the older repo not the newer one, sorry…
Improving the docs for this in <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-js-building-block-examples/pull/9>

Hi <@U048LSBAJUW> - Thanks for trying out the beta. Are you currently testing the beta on an EU portal?

We are still rolling out full functionality to EU portals which you will be able to toggle on and off at <https://app.HubSpot.com/design-manager/<YOUR_PORTAL_ID>/settings> . In the meantime, the local development server can be used to testing.

Hey <@U03U053QC72> I will be uploading to an EU sandbox I have yes. I will make sure to toggle this on.

Thank you.

> We are still rolling out full functionality to EU portals
To clarify, the toggle is not currently available on EU portals :soon:. Local development testing with the dev server is the best option in the interim. We can also help you make a North American sandbox portal with access if needed for testing.
